name: FTC Solar, Inc.
description: FTC Solar, Inc. is a leading provider of solar tracking solutions and engineering services for the renewable energy sector. Founded in 2017, FTC Solar aims to facilitate the transition to sustainable energy through innovative solar technology. The company specializes in designing and manufacturing advanced solar trackers that optimize energy production for utility-scale solar projects. Their flagship product, the Voyager tracker, is recognized for its efficiency, robust construction, and ease of installation, making it a preferred choice among developers and investors in the renewable energy market. FTC Solar is committed to enhancing the performance of solar energy systems, contributing to a cleaner environment while delivering value to customers. The company also provides comprehensive engineering services that support the development, construction, and operation of solar projects, ensuring that clients achieve their sustainability goals. With a focus on innovation, reliability, and customer satisfaction, FTC Solar is positioned to play a pivotal role in the global shift towards renewable energy.
